name: Sardine Sauce
recipeIngredient: 6 cans (3 3/4 ounces each) oil-packed sardines, drained and lightly crushed
5 tablespoons green peppercorns packed in brine, rinsed

recipeInstructions.text: In a food processor, pulse the eggs until slightly foamy, about 5 times. With the machine running, pour the oil through the feed tube a few drops at a time. When about 1 cup has been added and the sauce starts to thicken, pour a little faster, in a slow, steady stream, until the oil has been incorporated.
Add the sardines and 2 tablespoons of the peppercorns. Pulse to combine, about 10 times. Add the vinegar and salt, and pulse to combine.
Scrape the sauce into a medium bowl, and stir in the remaining peppercorns.
